description: Sample dashboard for the CS/ESPHome repo

targets.query:
production = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "site")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: float(v: r._value), _device: r._inverter }))
  |> yield(name: "production")
  
consumption = from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "sample")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value, _device: r._device}))
  |> yield(name: "consumption")

union(tables: [production, consumption])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_device"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> fill(column: "site", value: 0.0)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Net Power": r.site - r.line }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false, column: "Net Power")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "sample")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, Line: r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, column: "Line", createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

production = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -30m)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "site")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: float(v: r._value) }))
  |> yield(name: "production")

consumption = from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "sample")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "consumption")
  
union(tables: [production, consumption])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Delta: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "site")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Production": r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, column: "Production", createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "today" and exists r._meter)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_meter"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.delta_wh + r.reading) * 0.001 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Meter: if r._value > 100000.0 then r._value - 100000.0 else r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._meter == "delta_wh" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 0.001 }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -31d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, Production: r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -31d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, Consumption: r._value * -0.001}))

c1 = from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -60d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "today")
  |> movingAverage(n: 30)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _movavg: r._value * -0.001}))
  |> yield(name: "c1")

m1 = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -60d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "today")
  |> movingAverage(n: 30)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _movavg: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "m1")

join(tables: {d1: c1, d2: m1}, on: ["_time"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_movavg"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "30 day average": r._movavg_d1 + r._movavg_d2}))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -13mo, stop: -1mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "month")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, Previous: r._value * 0.001}))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "month")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Current": r._value * 0.001}))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -31d, stop: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, Previous: r._value * 0.001}))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, Current: r._value * 0.001}))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -60d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._device == "line" and r._field == "today")
  |> movingAverage(n: 30)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, MovingAverage: r._value * 0.001}))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "kitchen" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Kitchen": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "vehicles" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "EVs": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._device == "heatpump" and r._field == "sample")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Heat Pump": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._device == "hot_water" and r._field == "sample")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Hot Water": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "basement" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Basement": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "garage" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Garage": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "laundry" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Laundry": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "bedroom" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Bedrooms": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "main_floor" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Main Floor": r._value }))

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "sample")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._device == "line" or r._device == "l1" or r._device == "l2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._device == "hot_water" and r._field == "sample")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._device == "heatpump" and r._field == "sample")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "kitchen" and r._field == "sample")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._device != "outlets_1" and r._device != "outlets_2")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "kitchen")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._device == "outlets_1" or r._device == "outlets_2")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_device"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.outlets_1 + r.outlets_2 }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field", "outlets_1", "outlets_2"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "laundry" and r._field == "sample")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "vehicles" and r._field == "sample")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "bedroom" and r._field == "sample")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "main_floor" and r._field == "sample")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._location == "garage" and r._field == "sample")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_location", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._location == "kitchen" and not exists r._device) or r._device == "line")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value, _ratio: if exists r._location then "numerator" else "denominator" }))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_ratio"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Kitchen":
      if not exists r.denominator or r.denominator == 0.0 then 0.0
      else r.numerator / r.denominator * 100.0 } ))

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._location == "basement" and not exists r._device) or r._device == "line")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value, _ratio: if exists r._location then "numerator" else "denominator" }))

      if not exists r.denominator or r.denominator == 0.0 then 0.0
      else r.numerator / r.denominator * 100.0 } ))

  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._location == "vehicles" and not exists r._device) or r._device == "line")

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "EV Charging":
      if not exists r.denominator or r.denominator == 0.0 then 0.0
      else r.numerator / r.denominator * 100.0 } ))

  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._location == "main_floor" and not exists r._device) or r._device == "line")

from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._device == "hot_water" or r._device == "line")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value, _ratio: if r._device == "line" then "denominator" else "numerator" }))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_ratio"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Hot Water":
      if not exists r.denominator or r.denominator == 0.0 then 0.0
      else r.numerator / r.denominator * 100.0 } ))

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._device == "heatpump" or r._device == "line")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value, _ratio: if r._device == "line" then "denominator" else "numerator" }))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_ratio"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Heat Pump":
      if not exists r.denominator or r.denominator == 0.0 then 0.0
      else r.numerator / r.denominator * 100.0 } ))

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._device == "metered" or r._device == "line")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value, _ratio: if r._device == "line" then "denominator" else "numerator" }))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_ratio"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Unmetered":
      if not exists r.denominator or r.denominator == 0.0 then 0.0
      else (r.denominator - r.numerator) / r.denominator * 100.0 } ))

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f and r._location == "kitchen" and not exists r._device)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._device, Kitchen: r._value * 0.001 } ))
  |> toString()

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f and r._location == "laundry" and not exists r._device)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._device, Laundry: r._value * 0.001 } ))
  |> toString()

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f and r._location == "garage" and not exists r._device)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._device, Garage: r._value * 0.001 } ))
  |> toString()

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f and r._device == "hot_water")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._device, HotWater: r._value * 0.001 } ))
  |> toString()

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f and r._device == "heatpump")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._device, Heatpump: r._value * 0.001 } ))
  |> toString()

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f and (r._device == "metered" or r._device == "line"))
  |> drop(columns: ["_location"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_device"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._device, Unmetered: (r.line - r.metered) * 0.001 } ))
  |> toString()

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f and r._location == "vehicles" and r._device == "tesla")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "Tesla": r._value * 0.001, _value: r._device }))
  |> toString()
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_field"])

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f and r._location == "vehicles" and r._device == "juicebox")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "Nissan Leaf": r._value * 0.001, _value: r._device }))
  |> toString()
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_field"])

lookup = {Today: {p: -1d, f: "today"}, Month: {p: -32d, f: "month"}, Year: {p: -13mo, f: "year"}}
from(bucket: "cs24")
  |> range(start: lookup.${period}.p)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == lookup.${period}.f)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._device == "heatpump" or
                       r._device == "hot_water" or
                       (r._location == "kitchen" and not exists r._device) or
                       (r._location == "laundry" and not exists r._device) or
                       (r._location == "bedroom" and not exists r._device) or
                       (r._location == "basement" and not exists r._device) or
                       (r._location == "main_floor" and not exists r._device) or
                       (r._location == "garage" and not exists r._device) or
                       (r._location == "vehicles" and not exists r._device)
                    )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ kWh: r._value * 0.001, _value: if exists r._device then r._device else r._location }))
  |> toString()
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_field"])

title: CS/ESPHome Sample Panels
